me wagema thamayi sini yoda rasakala bima wargawala lebalaye sandahan kara athi warna sangnya ketha anuwath apa ganna panayange adangu sini pa්ramanaya gana dala adahasak athi kara gatha hakiyi.  kola (adu sini) ga්ram 02 kata adu/ mili litar 100) kola pahathi warna lebalaya thibena panayan thula mili litara 100 sini the handi 1/2 kata wada aduwenuyi thibenne.  thambaili (madhyastha sini) ga්ram 2-11 mili litar 100 kata* sini the handi 1/2- 03 th athara pa්ramanayak thibenawa.  rathu (wadi sini) ga්ram 11 ta wadi) mili litara 100 ka sini the handi 03ta wada wadi pa්ramanayak thibenawa.
